Interface HttpRequestHandler.AuthorizeHook

  • Enclosing class:
    HttpRequestHandler

    public static interface HttpRequestHandler.AuthorizeHook

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthorizeData authroize(io.netty.handler.codec.http.FullHttpRequest fullHttpRequest)
      在HTTP 升级成websocket之前被调用，如果返回AuthorizeData 非Null, 则通过授权认证；否则未通过授权
      void onSessionOpen(Session session) 

    • Method Detail

      • authroize

        AuthorizeData authroize(io.netty.handler.codec.http.FullHttpRequest fullHttpRequest)
                 throws AuthorizeException
        在HTTP 升级成websocket之前被调用，如果返回AuthorizeData 非Null, 则通过授权认证；否则未通过授权
        Parameters:
        fullHttpRequest - 完整Http请求
        Returns:
        通过授权认证的信息
        Throws:
        AuthorizeException - AuthorizeException
